name: Museum of Gameboy Art
description: You play as a tourist who just arrived on Beaumont Island - home of the Museum of Gameboy Art and a number of villagers. The museum features art that was originally captured on a gameboy camera. The museum also has platform levels with art-burglar enemies. This game also has side quests. You can access a to-list by clicking start. The side quests include playing an N64 spin-off game in a villager's house, logging in to a virtual windows 95 machine, and reading books. Have fun exploring Beaumont Island and interacting with the villagers.
